content:
advertisement

I have not always agreed with things Kris Ankarlo has said over the years PERIOD That being said I must say he does my transfer trash heart proud after reading his column  Feb PERIOD  PERIOD Whether it be from finances family situations or whatever the fact that you can still work for a Penn State education and take care of other needs should be a source of pride for the university  not a source of ridicule against those who do not have daddys wallet to take care of things PERIOD

I hope people feel that saying youre from Abington or DuBois or New Kensington is a great source of pride PERIOD You are not alone PERIOD You are not some second rate students PERIOD You are Penn State PERIOD
